items.sentence: Tom says that he only takes a bath once a month.
Tom hasn't been out of his house in a long time.
You know that I don't drive at night, don't you?
Are you sure that there's no way we can do that?
It's a pity that I don't understand French well.
Do you think that you could give me a ride home?
It might be a good idea for you to stay onshore.
It's important for you to learn to speak French.
Tom yelled at a customer which cost him his job.
Durian stinks, but it's said to be very healthy.
